response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Given its unique features and the high quality it embodies, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $999,999, reflecting our commitment to making this opportunity accessible while still recognizing the product's true worth. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and welcome any questions you might have. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 999999}
